mapper.select: select a.*,b.*,c.*, CASE WHEN a.p_category_idx = '1' THEN '개껌' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '2' THEN '스낵' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '3' THEN '뼈/육포' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '4' THEN '스틱' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '5' THEN '프리미엄' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '6' THEN '통살' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '7' THEN '츄르' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '8' THEN '스낵' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '9' THEN '캣잎' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '10' THEN '통살' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '11' THEN '프리미엄' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '12' THEN '스틱' ELSE '전체' END AS categoryName from product a join p_category b on a.p_category_idx = b.p_category_idx join product_img c on a.p_idx=c.p_idx where a.p_category_idx=#{p_category_idx};

select a.*,b.*,c.*, CASE WHEN a.p_category_idx = '0' THEN '전체' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '1' THEN '개껌' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '2' THEN '스낵' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '3' THEN '뼈/육포' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '4' THEN '스틱' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '5' THEN '프리미엄' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '6' THEN '통살' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '7' THEN '츄르' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '8' THEN '스낵' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '9' THEN '캣잎' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '10' THEN '통살' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '11' THEN '프리미엄' WHEN a.p_category_idx = '12' THEN '스틱' ELSE '잉' END AS categoryName, CASE WHEN b.p_category_large = '1' THEN '강아지' WHEN b.p_category_large = '2' THEN '고양이' ELSE '잉' END AS categoryLargeName from product a join p_category b on a.p_category_idx = b.p_category_idx join product_img c on a.p_idx=c.p_idx where b.p_category_large=#{p_category_large};
SELECT a.*,b.* FROM product a join product_img b on a.p_idx=b.p_idx WHERE b.p_front_img ORDER BY a.p_idx DESC;
